# cloudfil

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `cloudfil` is to fill the gaps in satellite images caused by clouds.

# Installation

The package can be installed from Github as follows:

```{r eval=FALSE}
library("devtools")
install_github("mmontesinosanmartin/cloudfil")
```
